markdownRemark.html: In this talk, we discuss the transition density of symmetric Markov processes. We focus on recent developments on Brownian-like jump process. This talk is based on joint papers with Joohak Bae, Jaehoon Kang, Jaehun Lee.

frontmatter.speaker: Panki Kim
frontmatter.title: Heat kernel estimates and their stabilities for symmetric jump processes: stable and beyond
